title: 发现某国内知名MC资源网站照搬本站翻译而不注明
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
对于这种行为要不要去交涉呢


举例：
http://www.minecraftxz.com/index.php/1-4-2-minecraft-1-4-2-multi-language-version-of-mc-green-sp-chinese-edition/
介绍完全复制http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-59911-1-1.html

http://www.minecraftxz.com/index.php/1-4-4minecraft-1-4-4-duo-guo-yu-yan-ban-mc-lv-se-sp-zhong-wen-ban/
介绍完全复制http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-64309-1-1.html

http://www.minecraftxz.com/index.php/1-3-2-minecraft1-3-1-multi-lingual-mc-green-sp-chinese-edition/
介绍完全复制http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-44324-1-3.html

http://www.minecraftxz.com/index.php/modloader-modloadermp-audiomod/
里面的视频是以前GB做的，放在以前的那个API下载帖里

replies.author: Danny仔
replies.txt_content: 這種侵權行為還不注明原帖地址,應該交涉一下的

replies.author: huhu
replies.txt_content: 这属于侵权行为，必须要交涉啊，最起码注明转载自mcbbs

replies.author: xiaoxiao
replies.txt_content: 应该交涉一下   真的好像侵权了

replies.author: 混乱
replies.txt_content: 不知道中文下载站现在是只有小编能投稿还是自由投稿。craft应该不会放任二搬的

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
Sky、果冻 发表于 2012-11-20 12:05 
不注明不就是侵权吗...
